name: Georgette
description:
Georgette is a Monster created in a lab by an ex-military scientist named Joe, for the purpose of bringing an end to the corruption of a once wonderful world.

Controls

  • WASD to move. To break things; just walk against them.
  • Click on enemies and buildings to shoot at them
  • The objective is to destroy buildings with the spinning cube above them.

Post LD version : coming soon
